mapper.sql: student_id, student_name, student_schoolname, student_age, student_sex, student_phone, student_wish, personality_id, create_time, mark
mapper.select: select sm.student_id, student_name, student_schoolname, student_age, student_sex, student_phone, student_wish, personality_id, create_time, mark from student_manage sm where student_name like CONCAT('%',#{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select sm.student_id, student_name, student_schoolname, student_age, student_sex, student_phone, student_wish, personality_id, create_time, mark from student_manage sm where student_id=#{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
